data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Ouaka, Central African Republic to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ouaka, Central African Republic
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Ouaka.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary: On average, 59 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Ouaka, Central African Republic.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Ouaka.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Ouaka, Central African Republic.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Fulani, Bagirmi people.
Father, make bold the prophets in Ouaka, Central African Republic so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 226,800 souls in Ouaka and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Ouaka, Central African Republic.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Ouaka
location.people_groups_list: Kpagua, Pygmy, Bamassa, Furu, Pygmy, Gbanziri, Gobu
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kpagua (4,900), Pygmy, Bamassa (14,000), Furu (5,600), Pygmy, Gbanziri (20,000), Gobu (2,400)
